website_summaries.verdict: An immediate upgrade for those who are loyal and have held on to tires for a long time.
pros: We especially love the attention to detail in the tread, which provides greater balance throughout a ride
Customers loyal to their previous tires were pleased by an easy and unexpected tire upgrade

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Troy-Bilt Bronco, per other reviews they really are hard to out on. Ended up calling a local Plaza Tire and they did it in less than 5 minutes for $14 including the old tire disposal, total is still cheaper than purchasing in store. First mow with tire worked as it should. Will update if it tears up. I bought an extra to keep as a spare since all local stores are currently out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Makes the old lawn tractor ride like new!
customer_reviews.text: These were a bear for my BF to put on because, well, they are tough tires and we are in hiding from Covid so weren't going to risk going to the tire shop (thank you youtube for the tricks of getting them on). Once on, they ride like a charm and I can tell they will last a very long time. This is one of those purchases I would not hesitate to do again. Mowing 3 acres of lawn is my zen so making sure I have good tires is a must
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: FIt JD L111.  Take these to the tire store for mounting or use tools and muscle.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and installed a pair of these on the front rims of my JD L111. I installed them using a 3/4' by 10" bolt that I clamped in a 4" vice. It took that setup plus some muscle and technique to mount these. I don't think they can be mounted without some sort of tool. If you want to try it, check out some youtube videos.
customer_reviews.author: J Boerger

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tires
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the front tires on my Craftsman riding lawnmower. I had a tire company replace the tires on the rims. I had done this process in the past and didn't like it so I hired the job done. They hold air better than I expected. Haven't put air in them since they were mounted on the rims. Good value. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ELL

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price, decent tires.quick ship with prime.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little concerned over some bad reviews but took a chance. 2 tires delivered by UPS to Alaska in only 3 days. Tires arrived in great shape with no box, shipping label attached directly to tires. Replaced old tires in about 30 minutes. Used soap and 3 large flat tip screwdrivers to remove and install. Compress tires with a ratchet strap to get bead to seal. An extra hand to air up the tire is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor practice
customer_reviews.text: Upon trying to put the tire on the rim I noticed a patch on the inner sidewall of the tire I already tore the wrapper and bar code off or I would have sent it back in my opinion this is not a good business practice. I advise everyone to thoroughly check the product from this company before you unwrap it
customer_reviews.author: dantheman

customer_reviews.title: What a difference a tire makes.
customer_reviews.text: I find Hi-Run tires preferable to Carlisle and other brands. They seem to be more durable but I have not had them long enough to see how they wear over the years. My mower seems like a new one with these tires on there. I own several mowers and will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: jarhead49

customer_reviews.title: These were shipped without being squished. Very happy definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I was concerned about these being deformed after shipping. They were not they were shipped without being squished. They perform very well at a great price. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sp

customer_reviews.title: Not squashed
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about buying these after seeing pictures of squashed tires and knowing that they may be next to impossible to mount. The two that I received were a breeze to install and looked just like the picture in the description.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Positive Product Review !
customer_reviews.text: Very Pleased, already mounted on lawn tractor, mechanic friend thought them 'good' tires, and so I am very pleased ! Great price, delivered in 3 days, Great Job Seller !
customer_reviews.author: Shayne G. Yetter

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement tires
customer_reviews.text: Great tread design. Fortunately I have a tire stand I use to replace my dirt bike tires.....made changing the tires with tire irons much easier. The application for these tires were replacements for my 42” lawn tractor.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I ordered this item. I had fast delivery of a very good product
customer_reviews.author: Bugs

customer_reviews.title: Getting the old tire off and the new one on was not as easy as I figured but
customer_reviews.text: Old tire dry-rotted and this was the fix. Getting the old tire off and the new one on was not as easy as I figured but, I got it done and the tire works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brad B.

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: This tire lasted about 2 years kept the tractor in the garage and still dry rotted. The other side is the original and is over 10 years old and still holding air.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sears

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit tightly on the rim which is what I want in a low-pressure tire.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Tires are good they don't skid on my lawn and don't tear ...
customer_reviews.text: Tires are good they don't skid on my lawn and don't tear up the grass. It's a good price to! they were a little stiff the tire man when he mounted them. I asked him what do you expect for a small tire
customer_reviews.author: Duwayne Schuman

customer_reviews.title: Good tread and works well
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it said it was. Good tread and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Goog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item just as described. Waiting for spring cutting season to see how it does.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a good quality tire. Have mowed 4 times so far with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Marc G

customer_reviews.title: J
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at half the price of retail stores in my area
customer_reviews.author: Chuyin

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement tires
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement tire for my riding mower. Arrived quickly and were easier to install than removing the ones being replaced
customer_reviews.author: Bob Quinker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I pacifically asked if they were four ply tires and when they came they were only two ply
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Ross

product_meta.title: Hi-Run LG Turf Lawn & Garden Tire -15/600-6
product_meta.description: Hi Run Riding Lawn Mower Tires are highly durable and strong enough to perform and last in any type of environment. Featuring closely packed tread blocks that provide great traction and balance which make these riding lawn mower tires the perfect choice to traverse any type of landscape. These tires feature a wide shoulder design that provides minimum damage to your turf and lawn. With a maximum load capacity of 350 pounds these tires are strong enough to withstand anything from mowing to hauling. This pneumatic tire can be filled to 14 psi, is 2 ply and measures 15 in x 6.0-6 in. Hi Run Riding Lawn Mower Tires are durable and long lasting while providing you the performance you need for any job that comes your way.
feature_bullets: Featuring closely packed tread blocks that provide great traction and balance.
Highly Durable Tire that provides a Maximum Load Capacity of 350 pounds.
Wide Shoulder design provides minimum damage to your equipment, turf and lawn.
Pneumatic Air Filled Tire fills to 14 psi and is 2 ply making it the perfect choice for your riding lawnmower.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars73 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
